external_games.name: Delaware St. John: Volume 1: The Curse of Midnight Manor
Delaware St. John: Volume 1 - The Curse of Midnight Manor

name: Delaware St. John: Volume 1 - The Curse of Midnight Manor
summary: Delaware St. John is able to see the extraordinary, and uses his gift to solve mysteries. One night, he ends up in the decrepit remains of an abandoned building, nicknamed Midnight Manor. Eerie voices call to Delaware, asking him to right the wrongs of their past. Delaware is not alone in the rotting building and will need your help in Delaware St. John: The Curse of Midnight Manor, a spooky Adventure game!
